extension.description: The default media center controller is based on the Xbox 360 controller.
The Dreamcast Controller is the primary user interface for the Sega Dreamcast. It is a logical progression from the 3D Control Pad for the Sega Saturn and is supported by every Dreamcast game.

Game Boy Advance is a 32-bit handheld video game console developed, manufactured and marketed by Nintendo.
Layout credit: ThaFake (thafake.deviantart.com)
The original Genesis controller had a directional pad, three main buttons and a start button. Sega later released a six-button version in 1993 with three additional face buttons.

The Nintendo 64 controller, released in 1996, features ten buttons, a digital control stick and a directional pad, all laid out in an "M" shape.
Layout credit: Andrew Moore
The game controller used for both the NES and the Famicom features a simple four button layout and a cross-shaped joypad.
The PlayStation Controller was a gamepad for the PlayStation. It was released by Sony Computer Entertainment in 1994.

The SNES controller adds two additional face buttons (X and Y) to the NES iteration, as well as two shoulder buttons.
layout.png credit: Alphathon (alphathon.deviantart.com)

extension.summary: Libretro compatibility layer for Kodi's Game API
extension.description: This add-on provides a wrapper for libretro cores, allowing them to be loaded as game add-ons.

Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!
Use your arrow keys to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one!
Created by Gabriele Cirulli. Based on 1024 by Veewo Studio and conceptually similar to Threes by Asher Vollmer.
License: Public domain

Beetle bSNES is the SNES module of Beetle, a fork of Mednafen. Mednafen's SNES module itself is a fork of bSNES v0.59.
Supported files: .smc, .fig, .bs, .st, .sfc
License: GPLv2

Beetle GBA is a fork of Mednafen's BGA core for the libretro project.
Supported files: .gba, .agb, .bin
License: GPLv2

Beetle Lynx is the Atari Lynx module of Beetle, a fork of Mednafen. The Mednafen module is a fork of Handy.
Supported files: .lnx
License: GPLv2

Based on NeoPop, this emulator is not very accurate in terms of low-level details. However, it is sufficient to play most commercially released games fairly well.
Supported files: .ngp, .ngc
License: GPL v2

BlueMSX is a rich MSX emulator. It supports most common machines and a wide variety of extension hardware.
Supported extensions: .rom, .ri, .mx1, .mx2, .col, .sg, .sc
Authors: Daniel Vik, Benoit Delvaux, Tomas Karlsson, Johan van Leur, Ricardo Bittencourt and Ray Zero
License: GPL v2

Port of FCEUmm to Libretro. FCEUmm emulates NES, Famicom, and Famicom Disk System (FDS). FCEUmm merges elements from FCEU Ultra, FCEU rerecording, FCEUXD, FCEUXDSP, FCEUXDSP CE, and FCEU-mm into a single branch of FCEU.
Supported files: .fds, .nes, .unif
License: GPLv2
Icon credit: Anarkhya (anarkhya.deviantart.com)

Gambatte is an accuracy-focused, open-source, cross-platform Game Boy Color emulator written in C++.
Supported files: .gb, .gbc, .dmg
License: GPLv2
extension.disclaimer: Game Boy and Game Boy Color are registered trademarks of Nintendo of America, Inc. Gambatte is not affiliated with or endorsed by any of the companies mentioned.

extension.description:
An enhanced port of Genesis Plus to the libretro API. Support for SG-1000, Mark-III, Master System, Game Gear, Mega Drive & Mega CD hardware.
Supported files: .mdx, .md, .smd, .gen, .bin, .cue, .iso, .sms, .gg, .sg
Special thanks to: twinaphex for backporting enhancements from the GX version (Gamecube/Wii port).
License: Modified BSD / LGPL v2.1

Handy is an Atari Lynx emulator by K. Wilkins for Windows 95/98/NT/2000/XP.
Supported files: .lnx
License: zlib

Meteor is a Nintendo Gameboy Advance emulator.
Supported files: .gba
Authors: Philippe Daouadi <p.daouadi@free.fr>, Hans-Kristian Arntzen (libretro port and fixes) <maister@archlinux.us>
License: GPLv3

Nestopia is a portable open source NES/Famicom emulator. It is designed to be as accurate as possible and supports a large number of peripherals. The hardware is emulated at cycle-by-cycle granularity, ensuring full support for software that does mid-scanline and other timing trickery.
Supported files: .nes, .fds
License: GPLv2
Icon credit: Anarkhya (anarkhya.deviantart.com)

extension.platforms: Genesis|Game Gear|SEGA Master System|Sega CD|Megadrive|Mega CD

extension.description:
Picodrive is yet another Megadrive / Genesis / Sega CD / Mega CD / 32X / SMS emulator heavily optimized for ARM.
Authors: Dave (aka fdave, finalburn author) and notaz
License: Non-commercial

The QuickNES core library, originally by Shay Green, heavily modified. QuickNES is a newer emulator that seems to have good compatibility.
Supported files: .nes
License: GPL v2
Icon credit: Garrett Brown

Snes9x is a portable, freeware SNES and Super Famicom emulator. Snes9x is coded in C++, with three assembler CPU emulation cores on the i386 Linux and Windows ports.
Supported files: .smc, .sfc, .swc, .fig
Icon credit: Alucryd (alucryd.deviantart.com)
License: Incompatible (GPLv2 & Non-commercial)
extension.disclaimer: The Snes9X team is not connected or affiliated with any mentioned company in any way. The opinions of the Snes9X team do not reflect the views of the various companies mentioned here. Companies and all products pertaining to that company are trademarks of that company. Please contact that company for trademark and copyright information.

extension.description:
Snes9x-Next is based on Snes9x, but has been heavily modified/speed-hacked to achieve better speed.
Supported files: .smc, .fig, .sfc, .gd3, .gd7, .dx2, .bsx, .swc
License: Incompatible (GPLv2 & Non-commercial)
Icon credit: Alucryd (alucryd.deviantart.com)

Stella is a multi-platform Atari 2600 VCS emulator. The Atari 2600 Video Computer System (VCS), introduced in 1977, was the most popular home video game system of the early 1980's.
Supported files: .a26, .bin
Stella was originally developed for Linux by Bradford W. Mott, and is currently maintained by Stephen Anthony.
License: GPLv2

VBA-Next is a fork from the now inactive VisualBoy Advance project, with goals to improve the compatibility and features of the emulator.
Supported files: .gba
License: GPLv2

VBA-M is a Nintendo Game Boy and Game Boy Advance emulator based on the official VisualBoyAdvance by Forgotten and the VBA development team.
Supported files: .gba
License: GPLv2

Yabause stands for Yet Another Buggy And Uncomplete Saturn Emulator. Yabause can boot Sega Saturn bios and games, some of which are playable.
Supported files: .bin, .cue, .iso
Icon credit: Anarkhya (anarkhya.deviantart.com)
License: GPLv2

extension.description:
Hierdie skraper kollekteer inligting vanaf die volgende ondersteunde werwe: MusicBrainz, last.fm, allmusic.com en amazon.de, terwyl kunswerke gegryp word vanaf: fanart.tv, last.fm en allmusic.com. Dit kan veld vir veld gestel word vanaf watter werf jy die spesifieke inligting wil h.
Die aanvaklike soektog word altyd op MusicBrainz gedoen. Ingeval skakels van allmusic en/of amazon.de nie bygevoeg is op die MusicBrainz werf, kan velde vanaf allmusic.com en/of amazon.de nie gaan haal word nie (egter baie maklik om daardie ontbrekende skakels by te voeg).

Esti scraper recueye informacin de les siguientes webs: MusicBrainz, last.fm, allmusic.com y amazon.de, mentanto obtin les imxenes de fanart.tv, last.fm y allmusic.com. Permite especificar de qu web se quier obtener la informacin pa cada campu. La gueta inicial faise siempre en MusicBrainz. En casu de que los enllaces a allmusic y/o amazon.de nun tean amestaos na web de MusicBrainz, nun van poder obtenese los campos d'informacin d' estos dos sitios (magar que ye mui fcil amestar esos enllaces que falten)

This scraper collects information from the following supported sites: MusicBrainz, last.fm, allmusic.com and amazon.de, while grabs artwork from: fanart.tv, last.fm and allmusic.com. It can be set field by field that from which site you want that specific information.
The initial search is always done on MusicBrainz. In case allmusic and/or amazon.de links are not added on the MusicBrainz site, fields from allmusic.com and/or amazon.de cannot be fetched (very easy to add those missing links though).

La cerca inicial es realitza sempre a MusicBrainz. En el cas que els enllaos d'allmusic i amazon.de no s'afegeixin al lloc MusicBrainz els camps d'allmusic i amazon.de i/o amazon.com no es poden obtenir (tot i que sn fcils d'afegir aquests enllaos restants).

Tento zdroj zskv data z nsledujcch podporovanch strnek: MusicBrainz, last.fm, allmusic.com and amazon.de, while grabs artwork from: fanart.tv, last.fm a allmusic.com. Je mono podrobn nastavit, kter informace si pejete zskat ze kterch strnek.
Prvotn vyhledn je vy provedeno na MusicBrainz. V ppad, e odkaz pro allmusic a nebo amazon.de nen pidan na strnku MusicBrainz, nen mon daje z allmusic.com a amazon.de sthnout (avak je velmi snadn tyto chybjc odkazy pidat).

Mae'r crafwr yn casglu gwybodaeth o'r gwefannau canlynol: MusicBrainz, last.fm, allmusic.com ac amazon.de, tra'n cipio gwaith celf o: fanart.tv, last.fm and allmusic.com. Mae modd ei osod fesul maes i ddewis pa wefan i gasglu gwybodaeth benodol.
Bydd y chwilio cychwynnol yn cael ei wneud ar MusicBrainz. Rhag ofn nad yw dolen allmusic wedi ei osod ar wefan MusicBrainz nid oes modd estyn meysydd o allmusic.com (mae'n hawdd gosod y dolenni coll hynny)

Lae alla ja installi lisasid ametlikust XBMC.org hoidlast.[CR] Ametliku hoidla kasutamise eeliseks on vimalus kasutada meie ulatuslikku failide peegelteenust laadides faile sulle kige lhemast serverist.[CR] Kik lisad selles hoidlas on lbinud elementaarse testimise. Lataa ja asenna lisosia virallisesta XBMC.org -lisosasilst.[CR] Kyttmll virallista sil sinun on mahdollista kytt hyvksesi meidn kattavaa tiedostojen peilauspalveluamme saavuttaaksesi korkeat latausnopeudet sinun lhialueeltasi.[CR] Kaikki tmn siln lisosat on testattu toimiviksi, jos lydt rikkinisen tai "ei toimivan" lisosan, ilmoita siit Team XBMC:lle, jotta voimme korjata asian.

Tlcharger et installer des extensions partir du dpt officiel XBMC.org.[CR] En utilisant le dpt officiel, vous bnficierez de notre service de serveurs miroirs vous permettant de tlcharger rapidement depuis une rgion proche de vous.[CR] Toutes les extensions de ce dpt ont t testes de manire basique, si vous trouvez une extension corrompue ou inutilisable, merci d'en informer la Team XBMC afin que nous puissions prendre les mesures ncessaires.

Descargar e instalar Engadidos dende o repositorio de engadidos oficial de XBMC.org.[CR] Empregando o repositorio oficial, vostede poder disfrutar das vanatexes do seu extenso servizo de replicacin de arquivos para axudar a descargas rpidas dende unha rexin preto a vostede.[CR] Tdolos Engadidos deste repositorio pasaron por comprobacins bsicas. Preuzmite i instalirajte dodatke sa slubenog XBMC.org izvora.[CR] Koritenjem slubenog izvora imate pristup file mirror usluzi koja vam omoguava bre preuzimanje zavisno od vae lokacije.[CR] Svi dodaci na ovom izvoru su proli osnovno testiranje, u sluaju da primijetite neispravan dodatak, molimo vas da to prijavite XBMC timu koji e zatim preuzeti potrebne korake.

Kiegsztk letltse s teleptse a hivatalos XBMC.org trolhelyrl.[CR] A hivatalos trolhely hasznlatval kihasznlhatod szertegaz tkr-kiszolgl hlzatunkat, ami segt a gyorsabb letltsben egy hozzd kzelebb es krzet hasznlatval.[CR] Minden kiegszt ezen a trolhelyen tment egy alaptesztelsen. Ha mgis hibs vagy nem mkd kiegsztt tallsz, krnk jelezd az XBMC csapatnak, hogy megtegyk a szksges lpseket.

Skja og setja inn vibtur fr hinu viurkennda XBMC.org vibta safni.[CR] Me v a nota etta safn getur ntt r mguleikann fullkmonni speglunar jnustu sem hjlpar vi a skja vibtur hraar fr landsvi nlgt r.[CR] Allar vibtur essu safni hafa gengi undir grunn prfanir, if finnur vibtur sem eru bilu ea virka ekki vinsamlegast lti XBMC teymi vita svo vi getum gert eitthva mlinu.

Download en installeer add-ons van het officile XBMC.org addon-repository.[CR] Wanneer u het officile repository gebruikt beschikt u over onze uitgebreide mirrorservice, waardoor u snel kan downloaden van locaties in uw buurt.[CR] Alle add-ons in dit repository ondergingen standaardtests; indien u een defecte of niet-werkende add-on vindt, meld dit dan aan Team XBMC zodat zij actie kunnen ondernemen.

Last ned og installer tillegg fra den offisielle XBMC.org tillegskilden.[CR] Nr du benytter den offisielle kilden drar du fordel av vr utvidede filspeilingstjeneste slik at du fr raskere nedlastinger fra en server nr deg.[CR] Alle tilleg i denne kilden har gtt gjennom grunnleggende testing, hvis du finner et tillegg som ikke funker vennligst rapporter det til Team XBMC s vi fr sett p det.

Pobieraj i instaluj wtyczki z oficjalnego repozytorium XBMC.org.[CR] Uywajc oficjalnego repozytorium korzystasz z serwerw lustrzanych, rozsianych po caym wiecie. Wybierany jest ten, ktry znajduje si najbliej ciebie, zapewniajc du prdko poczenia.[CR]Wszystkie wtyczki znajdujce si w tym repozytorium s testowane, ale mog okaza si niesprawne. Zgo wwczas bd, aby zaoga XBMC moga podj odpowiednie dziaanie.

Transferir e instalar add-ons do repositrio oficial XBMC.org.[CR] Ao usar o repositrio oficial, os nossos servidores garantem-lhe sempre transferncias rpidas a partir da localizao mais prxima.[CR] Todos os Add-ons neste repositrio foram alvo de testes preliminares. Na improvvel hiptese de encontrar um Add-on que no funcione, por favor contacte a equipa do XBMC, para que a situao se resolva.

Faa downloads e instale add-ons a partir do repositrio oficial do XBMC.org.[CR] Ao utilizar o repositrio oficial, voc ser capaz de tirar proveito do nosso servio de espelhamento de arquivos, auxiliando em downloads mais rpidos a partir de uma regio perto de voc.[CR] Todos os add-ons neste repositrio passam por testes bsicos, se voc encontrar um quebrado ou que no esteja funcionando, por favor reporte para a equipe do XBMC, para que possamos tomar as aes necessrias.

Descrcai i instalai suplimente din depozitul de suplimente XBMC.org oficial.[CR] Folosind depozitul (repository) oficial putei beneficia de serviciul nostru de gzduire distribuit pentru a v ajuta s descrcai mai repede dintr-o regiune mai apropiat de dumneavoastr.[CR] Toate suplimentele din acest depozit au trecut testele de baz, n caz c gsii un supliment defect v rugm s l raportai echipei XBMC pentru a lua msurile necesare.

Ak njdete pokoden alebo nefunkn rozrenie, oznmte to prosm tmu XBMC aby mohol poda potreby zakroi.

Se atopa algn Engadido roto ou non funcional, por favor reporteo equipo de Kodi para que poidan actuar en consecuencia.
Kodi.tv .[CR] Kodi.tv .[CR] . Kodi " .

Preuzmite i instalirajte dodatke sa slubenog Kodi.tv repozitorija dodataka.[CR] Koritenjem slubenog repozitorija bit ete u mogunosti iskoristiti prednosti usluge naeg brzog zrcalnog posluitelja datoteka, da bi mogli bre preuzimati iz regije koje je blie vaoj lokaciji.[CR] Svi dodaci na ovom repozitoriju proli su osnovno testiranje, u sluaju da primijetite neispravan dodatak, molimo vas da to prijavite Kodi timu koji e zatim poduzeti potrebne korake.

Kiegsztk letltse s teleptse a hivatalos Kodi.tv trolhelyrl.[CR] A hivatalos trolhely hasznlatval kihasznlhatod szertegaz tkr-kiszolgl hlzatunkat, ami segt a gyorsabb letltsben egy hozzd kzelebb es krzet hasznlatval.[CR] Minden kiegszt ezen a trolhelyen tment egy alaptesztelsen. Ha mgis hibs vagy nem mkd kiegsztt tallsz, krnk jelezd az Kodi csapatnak, hogy megtegyk a szksges lpseket.

Unduh dan pasang pengaya dari repositori pengaya resmi Kodi.tv. [CR] Dengan menggunakan repositori resmi anda akan mendapat keuntungan dari miror berkas kami yang luas dimana dapat membantu anda untuk lebih cepat mengunduh dari daerah yang dekat dengan anda. [CR] Semua pengaya pada repository telah melalui uji coba standar, jika anda menemukan pengaya yang rusak atau tidak bekerja tolong laporkan kepada tim Kodi agar kami bisa menindak lanjutinya.

Skja og setja inn vibtur fr hinu viurkennda Kodi.tv vibta safni.[CR] Me v a nota etta safn getur ntt r mguleikann fullkmonni speglunar jnustu sem hjlpar vi a skja vibtur hraar fr landsvi nlgt r.[CR] Allar vibtur essu safni hafa gengi undir grunn prfanir, ef finnur vibtur sem eru bilaar ea virka ekki vinsamlegast lti Kodi teymi vita svo vi getum gert eitthva mlinu.

Scarica ed installa gli add-on dalla libreria ufficiale di Kodi.tv[CR] Usando la libreria ufficiale avrai il vantaggio di ottenere download pi veloci con mirror pi vicini alla tua localit.[CR] Tutti gli add-on in questa libreria sono stati sottoposti a test di base, se ne trovi uno non funzionante o corrotto, per favore riporta il problema al team di Kodi cos potremmo prendere provvedimenti.

Lejupieldjiet un instaljiet pielikumus no oficil Kodi.tv pielikumu repozitorija[CR] Izmantojot oficilo repozitoriju, varsiet izmantot msu plao spoguu pakalpojumu, lai iegtu trkas lejupieldes no reiona, kas vistuvk.[CR] Visi pielikumi aj repozitorij ir izgjui pamata testanu, bet, ja atrodat saplsuu vai nestrdjou pielikumu, ldzu, ziojiet par to Team-Kodi, lai varam izpildt nepiecieams laboanas darbbas.
Kodi.tv .[CR] .[CR] , Kodi .

Muat turun dan pasang tambahan PVR melalui repositori rasmi Kodi.tv[CR] Dengan menggunakan Repositori rasmi anda dapat perkhidmatan cermin fail yang luas supaya dapat memuat turun lebih pantas menerusi kawasan berhampiran anda.[CR] Semua tambahan di dalam repositori ini telah lulus pengujian asas, jika anda temui tambahan yang rosak atau tidak berfungsi sila laporkannya kepada Team-Kodi supaya kami boleh membuat tindakan yang sewajarnya.

Last ned og installer utvidelser fra den offisielle Kodi.tv pakkebrnnen.[CR] Nr du benytter den offisielle pakkebrnnen kan du dra nytte av vr omfattende arkivtjeneste slik at du fr raskere nedlasting fra en server nr deg.[CR] Alle tillegg i denne brnnen har gtt gjennom grunnleggende testing, men hvis du finner et tillegg som ikke fungerer, vennligst rapporter det til Team-Kodi s vi fr sett p det.

Download en installeer add-ons uit de officile Kodi.tv add-on depot.[CR] Wanneer u de officile depot gebruikt beschikt u over onze uitgebreide mirrorservice, waardoor u snel kan downloaden van locaties in uw buurt.[CR] Alle add-ons in dit depot ondergingen standaardtests; indien u een defecte of niet-werkende add-on vindt, meld dit dan aan Team-Kodi zodat zij actie kunnen ondernemen.

Pobieraj i instaluj dodatki z oficjalnego repozytorium Kodi.tv.[CR] Uywajc oficjalnego repozytorium korzystasz z serwerw lustrzanych, rozsianych po caym wiecie. Wybierany jest ten, ktry znajduje si najbliej ciebie, zapewniajc du prdko poczenia.[CR]Wszystkie dodatki znajdujce si w tym repozytorium s testowane, ale mog okaza si niesprawne. Zgo wwczas bd, aby zesp Kodi mg podj odpowiednie dziaanie.

Transfira e instale add-ons a partir do repositrio oficial do Kodi.tv.[CR]|Ao utilizar o repositrio oficial, voc ser capaz de tirar proveito do nosso servio de espelhamento de arquivos, auxiliando em downloads mais rpidos a partir de uma regio perto de voc.[CR]|Todos os add-ons neste repositrio passam por testes bsicos, se voc encontrar algum quebrado ou que no esteja funcionando, por favor reporte para a equipe do Kodi, para que possamos tomar as aes necessrias.

Transferir e instalar os add-ons do repositrio de add-ons Oficiais de Kodi.tv.[CR]Ao utilizar o Repositrio oficial, ir beneficiar do nosso servio de servidores de ficheiro para o ajudar a ter transferncias mais rpidas a partir da regio mais perto de si.[CR]Todos os Add-ons neste repositrio foram alvo de testes bsicos. Se encontrar um danificado ou que no funciona, por favor, informe a Equipa do Kodi, para que a situao seja resolva.

Descrcai i instalai suplimente din depozitul de suplimente Kodi.tv oficial.[CR] Folosind depozitul (repository) oficial putei beneficia de serviciul nostru de gzduire distribuit pentru a v ajuta s descrcai mai repede dintr-o regiune mai apropiat de dumneavoastr.[CR] Toate suplimentele din acest depozit au trecut testele de baz, n caz c gsii un supliment defect v rugm s l raportai echipei Kodi pentru a lua msurile necesare.
Kodi.tv[CR] , .[CR] . , Kodi.

Stiahnu a naintalova rozrenia z oficilneho zdroja rozren Kodi.tv.[CR] Pouitm oficilneho zdroja zskavate monos vyui rozsiahly systm zrkadiel, ktor Vm umon rchlejie sahovanie z Vm blzkeho reginu.[CR] Vetky rozrenia v tomto zdroji boli podroben zkladnmu testovaniu. Ak njdete pokoden alebo nefunkn rozrenie, oznmte to prosm tmu Kodi aby mohol poda potreby zakroi.

Prenos in namestitev dodatkov iz uradnega skladia Kodi.tv.[CR] Z uporabo uradnega skladia, boste lahko izkoristili hitrejo povezavo, ki bo izbrana glede na vao lokacijo.[CR] Vsi dodatki tega skladia so bili osnovno stestirani, e pa boste nali pokvarjen ali nedelujo dodatek, to sporoite ekipi Kodi, da bomo lahko odpravili napake.
Kodi.tv .[CR] .[CR] , Kodi .

Preuzmi i instaliraj dodatne programe iz Zvaninog Kodi.tv spremita za dodatne programe.[CR] Korienjem zvaninog Spremita moi ete da iskoristite prednosti naeg servisa kopija fajlova koji e vam pomoi prilikom breg preuzimanja iz regiona blieg vaoj lokaciji.[CR] Svi dodatni programi u ovom spremitu proli su osnovno testiranje, u sluaju da pronaete neispravan dodatni program molimo vas da to prijavite Kodi timu koji e zatim preduzeti neophodne mere.

extension.summary: Mutagen is a Python module to handle audio metadata.
extension.description: Mutagen is a Python module to handle audio metadata. It supports ASF, FLAC, M4A, Monkey's Audio, MP3, Musepack, Ogg Opus, Ogg FLAC, Ogg Speex, Ogg Theora, Ogg Vorbis, True Audio, WavPack and OptimFROG audio files. All versions of ID3v2 are supported, and all standard ID3v2.4 frames are parsed. It can read Xing headers to accurately calculate the bitrate and length of MP3s. ID3 and APEv2 tags can be edited regardless of audio format. It can also manipulate Ogg streams on an individual packet/page level.
extension.disclaimer: Code taken from http://code.google.com/p/mutagen/

extension.summary: PyAMF provides Action Message Format (AMF) support for Python that is compatible with the Adobe Flash Player.
extension.description: The Adobe Integrated Runtime and Adobe Flash Player use AMF to communicate between an application and a remote server. AMF encodes remote procedure calls (RPC) into a compact binary representation that can be transferred over HTTP/HTTPS or the RTMP/RTMPS protocol. Objects and data values are serialized into this binary format, which increases performance, allowing applications to load data up to 10 times faster than with text-based formats such as XML or SOAP. AMF3, the default serialization for ActionScript 3.0, provides various advantages over AMF0, which is used for ActionScript 1.0 and 2.0. AMF3 sends data over the network more efficiently than AMF0. AMF3 supports sending int and uint objects as integers and supports data types that are available only in ActionScript 3.0, such as ByteArray, ArrayCollection, ObjectProxy and IExternalizable.

extension.description: Download and install add-ons for Kodi in the category "All" using SuperRepo.[CR][CR]By using SuperRepo repositories you will be able to take advantage of our serverside dependency checking, extensive file mirror service and many more.[CR]Visit our website at https://superrepo.org/ to browse the add-ons, create personal addon bundles and install whole bundles at once![CR][CR]

Download and installeer add-ons voor Kodi in de categorie "All" via SuperRepo.[CR]Door SuperRepo te installeren kunt u profiteren van onze controle van add-ons en ons uitgebreide server netwerk. Bezoek onze website op https://superrepo.org om door de add-ons te bladeren, persoonlijke add-on bundels te maken en complete bundels in 1 keer te installeren![CR][CR]

Preber a intaluj add-ons do kategrie "All" z SuperRepo.org add-on repozitr.[CR][CR]Ak si naiel add-on ktor je pokoden alebo nefunkn, alebo chce prida nov add-on, potom prosm pozri na https://superrepo.org/[CR][CR]Repozitr je udriavan komunitou Kodi a za pomoci SuperRepo Wiki, a tento preber add-ons z rznych zdrojov. Vzhadom na to, SuperRepo nenesie iadnu zodpovednos za sluby poskytovan tmito add-ons.[CR][CR]Rozren repozitr vyvinul Bart Otten[CR][CR]

Lade und installiere Addons der Kategorie "All" aus dem SuperRepo.org Addon Repository.[CR][CR]Mchtest du ein fehlerhaftes Addon melden oder ein neues Addon vorschlagen, kannst du dies ber unsere Webseite http://superrepo.org tun.[CR][CR]Das Repository wird mit Hilfe des SuperRepo Wiki durch die Kodi Community gepflegt und durch unseren Generator aus mehreren Quellen zusammengestellt. Daher bernimmt SuperRepo keinerlei Verantwortung fr diesen Service.[CR][CR]Der"eXtended Reposity Generator" wird durch Bart Otten entwickelt.[CR][CR]

Baixe e instale o add-ons na categoria "All" do Repositrio SuperRepo.org. [CR] [CR] Se voc encontrar um add-on quebrado ou no funcionando, ou voc gostaria de incluir um outro, por favor visite https://superrepo.org/ [CR] [CR]O repositrio mantida pela comunidade do Kodi usando o Wiki do SuperRepo e o nosso gerador de busca de add-ons mltiplas fontes. Portanto SuperRepo no aceita qualquer responsabilidade por esse servio.[CR][CR]O Gerador Reposity eXtended desenvolvido por Bart Otten[CR][CR]
